game_description: Tech it easy! 3 introduces students to the world of virtual reality (VR) with the new Tech 3 VR Tour application. Watch your students explore some of the most impressive places on our planet - and beyond - while learning English in an immersive and captivating way! Now, knowledge and adventure go hand in hand!
review_1: Not sure if it actually uses street view. It doesnt really, I think it uses google maps to generate some transition videos, but the content is from elsewhere. It's good 360 videos and I think some were 3d too. It was all very earnest and comfortable.
review_2: I'm sure it's great but for some reason I only get the sound but no picture. Downloaded and installed twice. Tell me what I'm doing wrong. Cheers.
review_3: I am using the occulus quest 2. Last update as usual. All I saw was a white screen when using stationary guardian
review_4: Just a white screen after clicking on locations and audio playing only.
review_5: Great app! I travelled to beautiful places across all continents and saw amazing stuff. I felt like having an English tour guide always by my side and got 100% the feeling of being there. The most immersive parts of the tour, when you get close to wild animals and when you take a dive into the water as a scuba diver are the best!!! I'd like to see more places and have more immersive experiences soon ;)
